member.name: SLOWAPPINFO
member.summary: Provides specialized application information to Add/Remove Programs in Control Panel. This structure is not applicable to published applications.

member.name: SLOWAPPINFO.ullSize
member.summary: The size of the application in bytes.

member.name: SLOWAPPINFO.ftLastUsed
member.summary: The time the application was last used.

member.name: SLOWAPPINFO.iTimesUsed
member.summary: The count of times the application has been used.

member.name: SLOWAPPINFO.pszImage
member.summary: A pointer to a string containing the path to the image that represents the application. The string buffer must be allocated using and freed using .
